title: Jury trial; demand; assignment to other court
context: [ยง633-31] Jury trial; demand; assignment to other court. In a case filed or pending in the small claims division of the district court in which a party entitled to a trial by jury files a demand therefor, the case shall be assigned to and tried in the circuit court under the procedure provided for jury trials. [L 1970, c 182, pt of ยง1]
